1001001100001010 1000000010111011 0 -> sum: 0001001111000101, cout: 1
0101111001000111 1001110111110101 0 -> sum: 1111110000111100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
